Key Match Events: Trent Alexander-Arnold scored the decisive penalty to give England a shootout victory.
Jordan Pickford saved a penalty from Manuel Akanji.
Breel Embolo scored for Switzerland in the 75th minute.
Bukayo Saka equalized for England in the 80th minute.
Declan Rice had a shot brilliantly saved by Yann Sommer in extra time.
Xherdan Shaqiri hit the post directly from a corner in extra time.
Post-Match Reflections: Gareth Southgate praised Bukayo Saka's bravery and resilience.
Bukayo Saka expressed happiness and determination to win in regular time in future matches.
Trent Alexander-Arnold highlighted the team's character, belief, and practice for penalties.
Gareth Southgate emphasized the importance of tactical precision and resilience.
Xherdan Shaqiri expressed disappointment over the penalty shootout loss and pride in the team's effort.
Miscellaneous Highlights: England reached their third semifinal in four tournaments.
Switzerland was seeking their first major semifinal.
The match was held at Merkur Spiel-Arena in Düsseldorf, Germany with an attendance of 46,907.
